en: Beauford Delaney sketchbook from the 1940s. It includes two portraits of Duke Ellington. Among the other drawings are charcoal and graphite sketches of jazz clubs and street scenes as well as several figure drawings.

Beauford Delaney sketchbook from the 1940s. It includes two portraits of Duke Ellington. Among the other drawings are charcoal and graphite sketches of jazz clubs and street scenes as well as several figure drawings.

seo.title: Beauford Delaney sketchbook, book 9 - Beauford Delaney Notebooks and Sketchbooks
seo.description: Beauford Delaney sketchbook from the 1940s. It includes two portraits of Duke Ellington. Among the other drawings are charcoal and graphite sketches of jazz clubs and street scenes as well as several figure drawings.
